MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G2 area of Glasgow. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6:39pm. Our engineers have arrived at the Kings Theatre substation to investigate the fault and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9:45pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:22pm on Monday, 23 November 2020.
